overview: Recorded in the former home of the São Paulo concerts Palace (now Citibank Hall in São Paulo) on 24 and 25 March 2000, the record confirms the tradition of releasing a live album every three studio albums (the band band inspired idea Rush, who does the same). The album features from old hits like Listen to What I Say, Do not Hear Nobody, Infinita Highway and Land of the Giants until recent songs such as The Mountain and The Promise.
title: Engenheiros do Hawaii: 10.000 Destinos
